title: Capturing electronic patient reported outcomes in oncology practice. - ASCO Publications

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: Over 60% of oncology practices struggle to capture electronic Patient-Reported Outcomes (**PROs**) effectively, highlighting a critical gap in clinical data collection and patient engagement.
**TACTICAL WIN** [SHIP NOW]: Implement AI-driven interfaces for PROs that simplify data entry for patients while ensuring high compliance rates among oncology patients.
